context: العائِلَةُ هِيَ مَجْمُوعَةُ الأَفْرَادِ الَّذِين يَعِيشُونَ مَعًا
الأُسْرَةُ هِيَ أَسَاسِ المُجْتَمَعِ والحَيَاةِ الاجْتِمَاعِيَّة
translations: The family is a group of individuals living together
The family is the foundation of society and social life
The grandfather loves his grandchildren very much

context: الجَدَّة تُحَبُّ قِضَاءَ الوَقْت مَع أَحْفَادِهَا
translations: The grandmother loves spending time with her grandchildren
The father loves his children very much
The father gives the best advice to his children

context: الأُمُّ هي أهم شخص في حياة الأطفال
translations: The mother is the most important person in a child's life
The mother loves her children very much

context: الأُخْت تَكُون عادةً أَقَرَبَ إلَى الأَخِ الصَغِيرِ
translations: Sisters are usually closer to the younger brother

context: الأُخُ يَقُدِّمُ الدَعْمَ لأَخَتِهِ في العُسْرِ والضِّيقِ
translations: The brother provides support to his sister in times of ease and hardship

context: الحَفِيدُ هوَ ابْنٌ أَوْ بِنْتُ الأَبْنِ أَو البِنْتِ
translations: The grandchild is the son or daughter of the son or daughter
Grandparents enjoy their time with their grandchildren

context: الأُخُّ التَوْأَمُ هوَ أُخٌ مُتَشَابِهٌ فِي العُمْرِ
الأُخْتٌ تَوْأَمَةٌ غَالِبًا يَشْتَرِكُ فِي الكَثِير مِن الأَشِيَاءِ
translations: The twin brother is a brother of similar age
Twin sisters often share many things
The uncle is the brother of the father
The maternal uncle is the brother of the mother

context: العَمَّةُ هي أُخْتُ الوَالِدِ أَو الوَالِدَةِ
translations: The aunt is the sister of the father
The maternal aunt is the sister of the mother

context: الزَوْجُ هو الشَخْصُ الَّذِي تَزَوَّجَت مِنه الزَوْجَةُ
translations: The husband is the man married to the wife

context: الزَوْجَةُ هي الشَخْصَةُ الَّتِي تَزَوَّجَت مِنها الزَوْجُ
translations: The wife is the woman married to the husband
He lives in a big house
She studies at the university
He loves travels and adventures

context: الابْنُ يُحبُ مُمارَسَةً الرِياضَةِ في الهَواءِ الطَلقِ
الأَبْنَاءُ هُم فِي طَريقِهِم إِلى المَدْرَسَةِ اليَومِ
translations: The son enjoys outdoor sports
The children are on their way to school today

vocabulary.en: In-laws (Parents of the Husband and Wife):
context: عَادَاتُ الاحْتِفَالِ بِزَوَاجِ الْأَصْهَارِ تَخْتَلِفُ مِنْ ثَقَافَةٍ إلَى أُخْرَى
translations: In-laws are the family of the husband and wife
Customs of celebrating in-laws marriage differ from one culture to another
The relative is a family member
Communication among relatives is encouraged

context: اللُقْبُ هُوَ الاسِمُ الشَرَفِيُّ أَو العَرَفِيُّ
الألُقُابُ تُسْتَخْدَمُ لِلإشَارَةِ إلَى الاحْتِرَامِ وَالتَقْدِيرِ
translations: The title is the honorific or customary name
Titles are used to show respect and appreciation
He is single and has not married yet

context: آنِسَةُ سَارَةِ هِيَ طَالِبَةٌ فِي الجَامِعَةِ
translations: Miss Sarah is a university student
He is married and has children
The woman is married to a kind man
They are engaged and will marry soon
Engagement is an important step before marriage
